nodes.name: New Client
nodes.notes: The Leadsie value is automatically generated for the new customer, where LeadsieId is the customer ID and LeadsieUrl is the one sent by email.

parameters.jsCode:
// Function node code
const inputData = $input.item.json.data[0].body;

// Create a new object with all the fields
return {
  json: {
    first_name: inputData.first_name,
    last_name: inputData.last_name,
    email: inputData.email,
    phone: inputData.phone,
    date_of_birth: inputData.date_of_birth,
    timezone: inputData.timezone,
    clothing_size: inputData.clothing_size,
    address: inputData.address,
    address_unit: inputData.address_unit,
    city: inputData.city,
    state: inputData.state,
    postal_code: inputData.postal_code,
    country: inputData.country,
    brokerage_name: inputData.brokerage_name,
    brokerage_address: inputData.brokerage_address,
    brokerage_unit: inputData.brokerage_unit,
    brokerage_city: inputData.brokerage_city,
    brokerage_state: inputData.brokerage_state,
    brokerage_postal_code: inputData.brokerage_postal_code,
    brokerage_country: inputData.brokerage_country,
    linkedin_url: inputData.linkedin_url,
    business_type: inputData.business_type,
    team_name: inputData.team_name,
    team_size: inputData.team_size,
    growth_obstacles: Array.isArray(inputData.growth_obstacles) ? inputData.growth_obstacles.join(', ') : inputData.growth_obstacles,
    other_growth_obstacle: inputData.other_growth_obstacle,
    deal_types: Array.isArray(inputData.deal_types) ? inputData.deal_types.join(', ') : inputData.deal_types,
    other_deal_type: inputData.other_deal_type,
    lead_sources: Array.isArray(inputData.lead_sources) ? inputData.lead_sources.join(', ') : inputData.lead_sources,
    other_lead_source: inputData.other_lead_source,
    transaction_types: Array.isArray(inputData.transaction_types) ? inputData.transaction_types.join(', ') : inputData.transaction_types,
    other_transaction_type: inputData.other_transaction_type,
    business_help: inputData.business_help,
    program_expectations: inputData.program_expectations,
    target_market: inputData.target_market,
    personal_instagram_handle: inputData.personal_instagram_handle,
    has_business_instagram: inputData.has_business_instagram,
    business_instagram_handle: inputData.business_instagram_handle,
    personal_facebook_url: inputData.personal_facebook_url,
    has_facebook_page: inputData.has_facebook_page,
    facebook_page_url: inputData.facebook_page_url,
    has_personal_website: inputData.has_personal_website,
    personal_website_url: inputData.personal_website_url,
    has_business_website: inputData.has_business_website,
    business_website_url: inputData.business_website_url,
    using_crm: inputData.using_crm,
    crm_name: inputData.crm_name,
    crm_connected_to_meta: inputData.crm_connected_to_meta,
    primary_color: inputData.primary_color,
    logo_url: inputData.logo_url,
    headshot_url: inputData.headshot_url,
    current_year_gci: inputData.current_year_gci,
    current_year_average_price: inputData.current_year_average_price,
    current_year_listings: inputData.current_year_listings,
    current_year_buyer_deals: inputData.current_year_buyer_deals,
    current_year_lease_deals: inputData.current_year_lease_deals,
    current_year_commission_percentage: inputData.current_year_commission_percentage,
    next_year_gci_goal: inputData.next_year_gci_goal,
    next_year_target_deal_size: inputData.next_year_target_deal_size,
    next_year_target_commission_percentage: inputData.next_year_target_commission_percentage,
    submission_date: inputData.submission_date,
    source: inputData.source,
    sourceLabel: inputData.source.replace('_onboarding', '').replace(/^./, str => str.toUpperCase()) === "Pro" ? "LeadGenius" : inputData.source.replace('_onboarding', '').replace(/^./, str => str.toUpperCase())
  }
}

parameters.text: =:gear: *Automation Update:* Pro Client Google Drive Folder Created for {{ $json.properties.Client.title[0].text.content }} *<{{ $json.properties['Client Folder'].url }}| Click Here to Access>*

parameters.subject: =Onboarding Completed - {{ $('Edit Fields').item.json.first_name }} {{ $('Edit Fields').item.json.last_name }}
parameters.contentValue:
= Onboarding Completed + Connect Account

Your onboarding process has been successfully completed!

Dear {{ $('Edit Fields').item.json.first_name }} {{ $('Edit Fields').item.json.last_name }},

We are pleased to inform you that we have received and processed your onboarding form. Our team is already working to take your experience to the next level.

Action Required â€“ Connect Your Account

To complete the setup, please connect your account with Sales Genius via Leadsie. Simply click the button below:

Connect Now

If you have any questions or need assistance, feel free to contact us.

Thank you for trusting Sales Genius!

Best regards,
The Sales Genius Team

© {{$now.format('yyyy')}} Sales Genius. All rights reserved.
